title: 22-month-old shot at Felton home
content:
Sheriff Bill Bergquist says she is in stable condition.
He says at about 5:30 Friday morning, they got a call from Sanford about a child with a gunshot wound in their facility. Deputies were sent to the hospital and to the house where the shooting occurred.
Family members were questioned, but no charges have been filed and no one has been arrested.
